channel.title: Client closes suddenly
channel.description:
Hi, i'm trying to play my server so i run client...after like 30 seconds it suddenly shuts down it says this long message in run.bat on other computers i don't have this problem
here
[img]http://img200.imageshack.us/img200/4798/73331664.jpg[/img]

item.title: Client closes suddenly
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Umm, The best advice I can offer is try a new client. If it still doesn’t work, try a new server. If it still doesn’t work, try re-installing java.

Read full topic
